mapper.select: select count(c.title) from (select distinct * from post where title like '%${searchKeyword}%' and categories like '%${categories}%' and public_setting like '%${public_setting}%') as c

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, n.* from (select * from post where title like '%${searchKeyword}%' and categories like '%${categories}%' and public_setting like '%${public_setting}%')n , (select @rownum:=0)as r) s where rownum between ${rowEnd} and ${rowStart} order by rownum desc

select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, n.* from (select * from post where title like '%${searchKeyword}%' and categories like '%${categories}%' and public_setting like '%${public_setting}%' and writer = #{userid})n , (select @rownum:=0)as r) s where rownum between ${rowEnd} and ${rowStart} order by rownum desc
select distinct p.title,p.seq, c.post_seq from post as p, postcomment as c where p.seq = c.post_seq order by seq desc
mapper.delete: delete from categories WHERE categories='${categories}' and writer = '${writer}'
